## Description

<!-- Describe your changes and why you're making them -->

## Type of Change

- [ ] New guide
- [ ] Content improvement (accuracy, expansion, examples)
- [ ] Interactive component (quiz, terminal, exercise, command-builder, code-walkthrough)
- [ ] Bug fix (broken links, build issues, component bugs)
- [ ] Infrastructure (CI/CD, MkDocs config, build scripts)
- [ ] Documentation (CONTRIBUTING, README, meta docs)

## Checklist

- [ ] I've previewed changes locally with `./setup-docs.sh && mkdocs serve`
- [ ] `mkdocs build --strict` passes with no errors
- [ ] No broken links or missing assets
- [ ] Content follows the [writing style guide](CONTRIBUTING.md#writing-style-guide)
- [ ] Interactive components tested manually in browser (if applicable)
- [ ] Commit messages use `docs:` or `docs(scope):` prefix
